title: User Cancels Streaming Subscription
description: A user wants to cancel their monthly streaming subscription. The agent must process the cancellation and attempt a retention offer.

tasks.description: Identify the subscriber and the reason for cancellation ('too expensive').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the user and logs the cancellation reason.

tasks.description: Check for available retention offers for the subscriber's profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a '50% off for 3 months' offer.

tasks.description: Present the retention offer. If declined, proceed with the cancellation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent presents the offer, the user declines, and the agent successfully cancels the subscription.
